title: Brewcipe
desc: A coffee sharing web application built using BootStrap and Express using MongoDB.
features: Users can make their own accounts
Users can create recipes and share them on the web application
Users can also comment on posts as well as liking and bookmarking posts

title: Budget Builder
features: Users can record their expenses as well as view possible trends in their spending
Users can set budgets to limit their expenses
Users earn coins by staying within their budget
Users can spend coins personalizing their own virtual room which is reset at the start of a financial period

title: ImuunoTD
desc: A serious tower defense game aimed to teach players about how the immune system works.
features: Users can place towers to defend against hordes of enemies
Users can learn about the immune system as the game progresses
